snippet: The Mets, who entered Monday night's game with a 30-38 record at Citi Field, changed up their batting practice schedule in an effort to shake up their offense.
abstract: The Mets, who entered Monday night's game with a 30-38 record at Citi Field, changed up their batting practice schedule in an effort to shake up their offense.

headline.main: Struggling at Home, Mets Try Something New
